description: This Python script demonstrates how to configure and use session summary references within an Agent, including setting up database connections, creating sessions, and printing responses with session summaries.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of interacting with memory and storage, configured with models and session settings.

classes.name: PostgresMemoryDb
classes.description: Handles PostgreSQL database interactions for storing memory data.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Manages in-memory data structures for the agent.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: Represents the Gemini language model used by the agent.

classes.name: PostgresStorage
classes.description: Handles PostgreSQL database interactions for storage.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response from the agent based on input text and user ID.
